mapper.select: SELECT A.*, AF.id AS artwork__file__id, AF.updateDate AS artwork__file__updateDate, AF.relTypeCode AS artwork__file__relTypeCode, AF.fileExt AS artwork__file__fileExt, AF.fileDir AS artwork__file__fileDir FROM artwork AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN file AS AF ON A.id = AF.relId AND AF.relTypeCode = "artwork" WHERE memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT A.*, AF.id AS artwork__file__id, AF.updateDate AS artwork__file__updateDate, AF.relTypeCode AS artwork__file__relTypeCode, AF.fileExt AS artwork__file__fileExt, AF.fileDir AS artwork__file__fileDir, MF.id AS member__file__id, MF.updateDate AS member__file__updateDate, MF.relTypeCode AS member__file__relTypeCode, MF.fileExt AS member__file__fileExt, MF.fileDir AS member__file__fileDir FROM artwork AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN file AS AF ON A.id = AF.relId AND AF.relTypeCode = "artwork" LEFT OUTER JOIN file MF ON A.memberId = MF.relId AND MF.relTypeCode = "member"
